Member Function Documentation

add ( $  arg1,
$  arg2 = NULL,
$  arg3 = NULL 
)

Add inputs to a map/reduce operation. This method takes three different forms, depending on the provided inputs. You can specify either a RiakObject, a string bucket name, or a bucket, key, and additional arg.

Parameters:
mixed$arg1- RiakObject or Bucket
mixed$arg2- Key or blank
mixed$arg3- Arg or blank
Returns:
RiakMapReduce
link ( $  bucket = '_',
$  tag = '_',
$  keep = FALSE 
)

Add a link phase to the map/reduce operation.

Parameters:
string$bucket- Bucket name (default '_', which means all buckets)
string$tag- Tag (default '_', which means all buckets)
boolean$keep- Flag whether to keep results from this stage in the map/reduce. (default FALSE, unless this is the last step in the phase)
Returns:
$this
map ( $  function,
$  options = array() 
)

Add a map phase to the map/reduce operation.

Parameters:
mixed$function- Either a named Javascript function (ie: "Riak.mapValues"), or an anonymous javascript function (ie: "function(...) { ... }" or an array ["erlang_module", "function"].
array()$options - An optional associative array containing "language", "keep" flag, and/or "arg".
Returns:
$this
reduce ( $  function,
$  options = array() 
)

Add a reduce phase to the map/reduce operation.

Parameters:
mixed$function- Either a named Javascript function (ie: "Riak.mapValues"), or an anonymous javascript function (ie: "function(...) { ... }" or an array ["erlang_module", "function"].
array()$options - An optional associative array containing "language", "keep" flag, and/or "arg".
Returns:
$this
RiakMapReduce ( $  client )

Construct a Map/Reduce object.

Parameters:
RiakClient$client- A RiakClient object.
Returns:
RiakMapReduce
run ( $  timeout = NULL )

Run the map/reduce operation. Returns an array of results, or an array of RiakLink objects if the last phase is a link phase.

Parameters:
integer$timeout- Timeout in seconds.
Returns:
array()
search ( $  bucket,
$  query 
)

Begin a map/reduce operation using a Search. This command will return an error unless executed against a Riak Search cluster.

Parameters:
string$bucket- The Bucket to search.
stringquery - The Query to execute. (Lucene syntax.)
Returns:
RiakMapReduce
